document.full_text: oakland athletics outfielder josh willingham has appealed after being fined and suspended for one game for making contact with an umpire, major league baseball said on monday.
document.title: oakland outfielder willingham appeals against ban
lines_and_colors: oakland athletics outfielder josh willingham has appealed after being fined and suspended for one game for making contact with an umpire, major league baseball said on monday.
